price: Vama je poznato šta se dogodilo onima od vas koji su subotu oskrnavili, pa smo im Mi rekli: "Budite majmuni prezreni!"
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱعۡتَدَوۡاْ مِنكُمۡ فِي ٱلسَّبۡتِ فَقُلۡنَا لَهُمۡ كُونُواْ قِرَدَةً خَٰسِـِٔينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿalim'tumu alladhīna iʿ'tadaw minkum fī al-sabti faqul'nā lahum kūnū qiradatan khāsiīna
